00048   inline double fonction_forme_2D(double x, double y, int le_poly,
00049                                   int face, const IntTab& sommet_poly,
00050                                   const DoubleTab& coord) const
00051   {
00052     return 1 - 2 * coord_barycentrique_P1_triangle(sommet_poly, coord, x, y, le_poly, face);
00053   }
00054 
00055   inline double fonction_forme_3D(double x, double y, double z,
00056                                   int le_poly, int face,
00057                                   const IntTab& sommet_poly,
00058                                   const DoubleTab& coord) const
00059   {
00060     return 1 - 3 * coord_barycentrique_P1_tetraedre(sommet_poly, coord, x, y, z, le_poly, face);
00061   }
00062 
00063   inline double coord_barycentrique(const IntTab& sommet_poly, const DoubleTab& coord,
00064                                     double x, double y,
00065                                     int le_poly, int face) const
00066   {
00067     return coord_barycentrique_P1_triangle(sommet_poly, coord, x, y, le_poly, face);
00068   }
00069 
00070   inline double coord_barycentrique(const IntTab& sommet_poly, const DoubleTab& coord,
00071                                     double x, double y, double z,
00072                                     int le_poly, int face) const
00073   {
00074     return coord_barycentrique_P1_tetraedre(sommet_poly, coord, x, y, z, le_poly, face);
00075   }

00217 
00218 inline DoubleTab& Champ_P1NC_implementation::trace(const Frontiere_dis_base& fr, const DoubleTab& y, DoubleTab& x,int distant) const
00219 {
00220   if (distant)
00221     fr.frontiere().trace_face_distant(y, x);
00222   else
00223     {
00224       fr.frontiere().trace_face_local(y, x);
00225       x.echange_espace_virtuel();
00226     }
00227   return x;
00228 }
